data.name: Luminescence
data.detailed_description:
Luminescence is a Parkour/Platforming experience across the constellations of space in levels themed to real stars across the universe


  • Illuminate the path with a unique visual mechanic displaying obstacles & paths close to you
  • Grapple, Wallrun, Slide, Strafe, Flip and more as you sprint towards the goal: Touching the stars of the Galaxy
  • Switch between First & Third-person perspectives on the fly!


  • Unlock different colorful outfits through challenges that give game-changing special effects!
  • Race against your friend's times with the Steam Leaderboard
  • A large variety of Drum & Bass, EDM and Atmospheric Soundtracks to move to

data.short_description: Illuminate the path in this Parkour experience across the constellations of Space

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2550K | AMD FX-8350
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 650 Ti, 2 GB | AMD Radeon R7 360, 2 GB
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: System requirements are subject to change
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-8400 | AMD Ryzen 5 2600
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 780, 3 GB | AMD Radeon R9 290X, 4 GB
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: System requirements are subject to change
